First off, I'm having a few problems with heritrix.  I'm crawling
nytimes.com.

1) Although I've enabled the domain scope filter, my crawls
   are running off to things like ad.doubleclick.net.
2) It doesn't look like I'm actually getting through the login
   pages.

Since this list probably doesn't permit attachments, I tar'd the
logs, crawl.xml, and seeds.txt and put them at:

http://l.armory.com/~cerise/heritrix.tgz

I suspect I have something setup wrong (since I imagine this is
pretty well tested).  If these are bugs, is there a bugzilla for
heritrix?

-Phil/CERisE
